articles.author: Toby Alder, Winnie Hsu
articles.title: Asian Stocks Look Muted as Traders Await Fed Clues: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian stocks were mixed as investors awaited clues about the Federal Reserve’s policy path in its final interest-rate decision of the year.
articles.content:
